name: CPACafe
0:
”Alexa, Open C.P.A Cafe”
”What do I have for Breakfast”
”lunch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. p. a. cafe
des:
This skill will help you figure out Breakfast or Lunch Menu for the current Month. Based on the Menu published by the school on Facebook page, I will be updating the menu used by Alexa app. Hope you find this useful in your busy schedule. 
You can launch the app by saying "Open CPA Cafe" OR "Launch CPA Cafe".
After this you can ask for Breakfast or Lunch menu by saying different phrases such as - 
* Tell me lunch menu for tomorrow
* What do I have for breakfast today
* Lunch
* Breakfast
* etc.
You can use different date related terms like "Yesterday", "Today", "Tomorrow", "Day After Tomorrow", "Next Monday", "Actual date" .
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
